disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Vantage6 is an open-source project, that might be used by anyone. This Privacy statement is not a legal document, and does not create any rights or obligations. It is provided only to inform you what personal information the vantage6 software collects, and how it is used.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy statement describes how Vantage6 collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our federated learning platform. The vantage6 project is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your data.

dataCollection.title: Data collection
dataCollection.content: Vantage6 collects the following types of information:
dataCollection.item1: Account information (username, email address, organization name)

dataUsage.title: How vantage6 uses your data
dataUsage.content: Your data is used only to provide a working federated learning platform, and to comply with legal obligations.
dataUsage.details-account: Cookies are used to authenticate you. These cookies are essential for the functioning of vantage6, and are the only cookies used by vantage6.
dataUsage.details-usage: The vantage6 software logs which requests you make to our platform, and when. Depending on the project, logging may be a legal requirement that can be used to prevent or detect abuse. Also, logging may be used in your project to detect errors in the vantage6 software, or in related components, such as algorithms run in your project. The log level set in your vantage6 project determines the amount of information that is logged.

dataSharing.title: Data sharing
dataSharing.content: Vantage6 is not a commercial platform and as such, has no commercial interest in your data. The vantage6 software has no built-in mechanism to share your personal information. Although the vantage6 team would not endorse this, the organization responsible for maintaining vantage6 in your project is technically able to share your data. In rare cases, they may even be required by law to share data.

dataSecurity.title: Data security
dataSecurity.content: The vantage6 software aims to implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Note that, as an open-source platform, there is not a single organization that is responsible for the security of the vantage6 software. Also, the way in which vantage6 is deployed in your project`will determine the security of your data. The vantage6 development team recommends that every project has a party that takes responsibility for the security.

userRights.title: Your personal information
userRights.content: You should contact the organization responsible for maintaining vantage6 in your project if you have any questions about your personal information.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy statement, please reach out to us on Discord, create an issue on GitHub:

choose-collaboration.title: Choose a collaboration
choose-collaboration.no-collaborations: Your organization is not part of any collaborations yet. Please contact your vantage6 project manager to set up a collaboration or go to the administration section to create a new collaboration.

card-private-key.title: Upload private key
card-private-key.description: Please upload a new private key if you want to want to change the key that is currently in use.

upload-key.title: Upload encryption key
upload-key.description: The collaboration that you selected is encrypted. Upload your private key to decrypt the encrypted data.
upload-key.description-part-two: Your private key will be used to decrypt the data locally, and does not leave your browser. Uploading an incorrect key will allow you to continue to view some task metadata, but not the task's input arguments and results.

chosen-collaboration-alert.info: The content displayed is specific to this collaboration

chosen-store-alert.info: The content displayed is specific to this algorithm store

session.title: Session {{name}}
session.delete-title: Are you sure you want to delete session '{{name}}'?
session.name: Name

dataframes.title: Dataframes
dataframes.db-label: Database used to create this dataframe
dataframes.last_session_task: Last task executed on this dataframe
dataframes.no-dataframes: No dataframes created yet for this session.

dataframe-read.title: Dataframe {{name}}
dataframe-read.not-ready-despite-extraction: The data extraction task to produce this dataframe failed. The dataframe cannot be used for analyses.
dataframe-read.last-session-task-failed: The last task in this dataframe failed. Please check if this does not impact further analyses.

columns.title: Dataframe columns
columns.no-columns: No columns are available for this dataframe.
columns.name: Column name

alerts.no-columns-for-node: The node '{{node}}' does not have any columns available for this dataframe.
alerts.missing-column: The column '{{column}}' is not available on the node '{{node}}'.
alerts.mixed-types: The column '{{column}}' has different data types on different nodes. Types found: {{types}}.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the dataframe '{{name}}'?

tasks-table.title: Tasks using this dataframe
tasks-table.no-tasks: No tasks are using this dataframe.

task.name: Name
task.alert-node-offline: The node '{{name}}' is offline. This task will be handled when the node is back online.
task.alert-blob-read-arguments: Input is stored in blob storage. Please use the UUID in the python client to retrieve the input.
task.alert-blob-read-result: Result is stored in blob storage. Please use the UUID in the python client to retrieve the result.
task.alert-failed-read-arguments-function: Failed to parse function arguments, therefore, information about the function cannot be displayed.
task.alert-failed-read-arguments-visualizatio: Failed to parse function arguments, therefore, no visualization can be displayed.
task.alert-failed-read-encrypted-result: Result was not successfully decoded and decrypted. Please use your private key locally to decrypt the results, and then perform base64 decoding.
task.alert-failed-read-result: Result was not successfully decoded. Please perform base64 decoding locally to get the results.

task-run.alert-node-offline: Algorithm run can't start, node is offline.

task-create.title: Create analysis
task-create.alert-dataframes-not-ready: None of the dataframes in the selected session are ready to use. Most likely, the data extraction task to produce them failed. You can only use this session to create tasks that do not use data.

step-study.title: Select study
step-study.explanation: Your collaboration defines studies, which allows you to quickly select a set of organizations to run a certain type of analysis for.
step-study.description: Select the study you want to run an analysis for. If you want to run the analysis for the entire collaboration, select that option.

description.function: Select which algorithm function you want to run
description.name: Provide a suitable name for your task
description.df-name: Provide a suitable name for the dataframe created by this task
description.df-name-warning: The dataframe name is not filled in for repeating data extraction tasks. Please provide a unique name for the dataframe.
description.description: Optionally, describe your task so you can find it back later
description.organization-central: Select the organization that will run this function. Note that you have selected a central function, which will probably create subtasks for other organizations in the collaboration
description.organization-partial: Select the organizations that will carry out a partial function. By default, all organizations are selected as federated actions are usually carried out on all data stations.
description.function-restricted-to-same-image: The selected session only allows functions from the same image to be run throughout the session. Therefore, only functions from the session's allowed image are shown.

step-database.title: Select databases

description.database: Select the database(s) you want to use. The options in the dropdown represent the database labels defined in the node configuration file.
description.query: This database is a {{dbType}} database. Provide a query to select the data
description.worksheet: This database is an Excel file. Provide the name of the worksheet to use

step-database.error-db-update: Could not retrieve node configuration. The database step will not be available. Please try again later.
step-database.no-databases-available: No databases are available on the node! Please contact the node administrator to configure databases.

step-dataframe.title: Select dataframe
step-dataframe.description: Select the dataframe(s) you want to use. The options in the dropdown represent the dataframes created in the selected session.
step-dataframe.alert-dataframe-not-ready-for-all-select: The selected dataframe is not properly created for selected organizations: {{organizations}}. Please deselect these organization or create a new dataframe that also supports them.

step-parameters.title: Define parameters
step-parameters.description: Provide parameter values for the selected algorithm function
step-parameters.upload-or-fill-in-json: Upload a JSON file or fill in the JSON input field
step-parameters.warning-column-list-multiple-dataframes: This function accepts multiple dataframes in a single argument. The selection of columns are from the first selected dataframe.

task-create.alert-no-online-nodes: You cannot create an analysis right now because no nodes are online in your collaboration. Online nodes are required to collect information on available databases and columns. Please try again later or contact your collaboration manager.
task-create.alert-no-sessions-found: No sessions found. To compute you must first create a session.
task-create.alert-no-stores: You cannot create an analysis because no algorithm stores are available to your collaboration. These are required to obtain the available algorithms from. Please contact your collaboration manager.
task-create.alert-no-algorithms: You cannot create an analysis because no algorithms can be retrieved from the algorithm stores that are linked to your collaboration. Please contact your collaboration manager.
task-create.alert-no-node-config: The node '{{name}}' does not share its configuration, nor does any other node that is online. This is required to determine the available databases. Please contact the node administrator.
task-create.alert-no-databases: The node '{{name}}' configuration does not contain any databases, while this algorithm function requires one or more. Please contact the node administrator so that they might add them.
task-create.alert-no-dataframes-in-session: The selected session does not contain any dataframes yet. Most analyses require a dataframe to be created first.
task-create.alert-no-dataframes: The selected session does not contain any ready-to-use dataframes, while this algorithm function requires one or more. Please initialize your session by creating a dataframe.

task-read.title: Analysis

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the task '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all subtasks and results.
This operation cannot be undone.

kill-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to kill the task '{{name}}'?
kill-dialog.content:
Note, this will also kill all subtasks.
This operation cannot be undone.

task-read.alert-algorithm-not-found: The algorithm used in this analysis could not be retrieved from the algorithm store. This limits the displayed information. This may happen if an analysis is created in the Python client or if the algorithm is no longer approved.

function.standalone_tooltip: Whether this function produces useful results when running it by itself. Disabling this option will hide the function when creating tasks in this UI.

argument.title: Parameters
argument.list-warning: This argument is a list. Provide a list of values separated by a comma.

condition.has_condition: Should only be provided conditionally on other argument:
condition.explanation: Fill in the conditions under which this argument should be provided.

frontend_only.toggle_explain: This argument is only used in the UI and will not be passed to the algorithm.
frontend_only.details: Use this if e.g. for a flag if user should provide either one argument or the other, to say which they want to provide.

databases.title: Databases
databases.multiple: Does the algorithm accept multiple dataframes in this single argument?

algorithm-list.title: Algorithms
algorithm-list.no-algorithms: No algorithms are available for your collaboration!

algorithm-old-list.title: Invalidated algorithms
algorithm-old-list.alert: The following algorithms are not available for use in analyses any more. They have been replaced by newer versions or have been rejected by reviewers.
algorithm-old-list.no-algorithms: No old algorithms are available for your collaboration!

card-functions.title: Functions
card-functions.no-functions: This algorithm does not contain any functions. Please contact the algorithm store administrator.
card-functions.no-parameters: This function does not take any parameters.
card-functions.no-databases: This function does not use any data.
card-functions.no-visualizations: There are no preprogrammed visualizations available for this user interface.

invalidate-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to invalidate the algorithm '{{name}}'? It will no longer be available for use in analyses.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the algorithm '{{name}}' from the store '{{store}}'?
delete-dialog.content: Note that this is *NOT* recommended: invalidating the algorithm is preferred as the algorithm signature will still be available while the algorithm store retracts approval of it. This operation cannot be undone.

card-download-json.title: Download algorithm description
card-download-json.description: You can use the algorithm JSON representation to upload this algorithm into another algorithm store. Also, it is recommended to store it in your algorithm's git repository so that you and others can easily upload it into algorithm stores in the future.

assign-review.common-content: This algorithm is awaiting review assignment. It is not available for use in tasks until the algorithm is reviewed and approved.
assign-review.content-insufficient-reviewers: Note that this store requires more than the {{current_num_reviews}} review(s) currently assigned to approve the algorithm.

under-review.content: This algorithm is under review. It is not available for use in analyses.

alert.invalidated: This algorithm is {{ status }}. It is not available for use in analyses.

algorithm-create.title: Add a new algorithm to the algorithm store
algorithm-create.subtitle: Add algorithm details

parameter.title: Parameter
parameter.conditional-fields-error: All conditional fields must be filled or all must be empty

visualization.title: Visualization
visualization.explanation: By adding this visualization, the results of your algorithm will automatically be visualized in this user interface.

card-from-json.title: Upload algorithm from JSON
card-from-json.description: You can prefill this form by uploading an algorithm from a JSON file. This file is present when creating an algorithm with `v6 algorithm create`, or you may have downloaded it from another vantage6 algorithm store.

success-dialog.title: Algorithm updated
success-dialog.message: The algorithm has been updated successfully.

error-dialog.title: Error updating algorithm
error-dialog.message: An error occurred while updating the algorithm: {{error}}

in-review.title: Algorithms currently in review
in-review.no-algorithms: No algorithms are currently in review.

to-assign-review.title: Algorithms that are not assigned to reviewers yet
to-assign-review.no-algorithms: All pending algorithms have been assigned reviewers.

card-all-pending.content: This page shows only pending algorithms that you are involved in - not those of other users.

card-reviews.title: Algorithm reviews assigned to me
card-reviews.no-reviews: No reviews are assigned to you.

card-to-review.title: Algorithms where I can assign reviewers
card-to-review.no-algorithms: No algorithms are available to assign reviewers to.

card-developed-algorithms.title: Pending algorithms developed by me
card-developed-algorithms.no-algorithms: No algorithms that you have developed are pending review.

algorithm-assign-review.title: Assign reviewers
algorithm-assign-review.no-reviewers: No reviewers are available to assign to this algorithm. Please contact your store manager.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the review by '{{reviewer}}'?
delete-dialog.content: If other reviews are present and have been approved, the algorithm will be approved. If no other reviews are present, the algorithm will have to be assigned reviewers again.

approve-dialog.title: Approve algorithm
approve-dialog.content: Are you sure you want to approve this algorithm?

reject-dialog.title: Reject algorithm
reject-dialog.content: Are you sure you want to reject this algorithm? The developer will need to resubmit the algorithm for review.

organization-read.title: Organization

card-nodes.title: Nodes
card-nodes.alert-missing-nodes: Nodes are missing for collaborations: {{collaborations}}. Please ensure that they are registered and online.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the organization '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all users, nodes, tasks, algorithm runs and nodes related to this organization.
This operation cannot be undone.

organization-read.no-collaborations: No collaborations are available for this organization yet.
organization-read.no-nodes: No nodes are available for this organization yet.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to remove the algorithm store '{{name}}' from the collaboration '{{collaboration}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Users will no longer be able to create analyses in this collaboration with the algorithms in this store.
The algorithm store can be added back to the collaboration at any time.

api-key-download-dialog.title: API key download
api-key-download-dialog.create-message: The API keys have been downloaded.
api-key-download-dialog.edit-message: The API keys for the new organizations in the collaboration have been downloaded.
api-key-download-dialog.reset-message: Your API key has been reset. Please read your new key in the file that has been downloaded.
api-key-download-dialog.security-message: Please distribute each of these keys privately to each of the organizations. Note that they may reset their API key so that no-one but them knows it.

collaboration-read.title: Collaboration

card-nodes.title: Nodes
card-nodes.add-own-org: Register missing node for your organization

card-algorithm-stores.title: Algorithm stores available to this collaboration
card-algorithm-stores.no-stores: No algorithm stores are available to this collaboration yet.

card-studies.title: Studies
card-studies.no-studies: No studies are available to this collaboration yet.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the collaboration '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all nodes and tasks related to this collaboration.
This operation cannot be undone.

collaboration-read.alert-missing-nodes: Not all organizations have registered nodes for this collaboration. Please ensure that they are registered and active before sending analyses.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the study '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all analyses related to this study.
This operation cannot be undone.

store-role-create.title: Add a new role to the algorithm store

algorithm-store-add.title: Add algorithm store to your collaboration
algorithm-store-add.name: Name

form.name-hint: This name will be used to identify the algorithm store in your collaboration(s).
form.url-hint: The web address of the algorithm store, excluding the API path.
form.api-path-hint: The API path to the algorithm store. Default is '/api'.
form.all-collaborations: Make this algorithm store available to all collaborations

algorithm-store-list.title: Algorithm stores
algorithm-store-list.no-stores: No algorithm stores have been coupled to any of the collaborations you are allowed to view.

algorithm-store-read.title: Algorithm store

card-collaborations.title: Collaborations
card-collaborations.description: This algorithm store is available to the following collaborations:

algorithm-store-read.for-all-collaborations: This algorithm store is available to all collaborations.

card-algorithms.title: Algorithms
card-algorithms.description: This algorithm store contains the following algorithms:
card-algorithms.no-algorithms: No algorithms are available in this store.
card-algorithms.no-algorithm-view-permission: You do not have permission to view the algorithms in this store.

card-policies.title: Policies
card-policies.description: This algorithm store has the following policies:

store-policies.min_reviewing_organizations: Minimum number of organizations providing reviewers
store-policies.assign_review_own_algorithm: Are developers allowed to assign reviewers for their own algorithms?
store-policies.allowed_reviewers: Users allowed to review (extra check on top of permission)
store-policies.allowed_review_assigners: Users allowed to assign reviews (extra check on top of permission)

role-read.title: view
role-read.no-users: No users have been assigned to the selected role.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the role '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also remove this role from all users.
This operation cannot be undone.

user-create.title: Create user
user-create.setting-service-account: You are setting up a service account user. This user will get a generated secret that should be stored securely. The user should only be used for automated tasks.

service-account-download-dialog.title: Service Account Created
service-account-download-dialog.message: The service account has been created successfully. The credentials have been downloaded.
service-account-download-dialog.security-message: Important: Keep these credentials secure and do not share them. They provide access to your organization's data.

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete the user '{{name}}'?
delete-dialog.content:
Note, this will also delete all analyses this user created. This operation cannot be undone.
Please also choose if you want to delete the linked Keycloak account as well.
delete-dialog.delete-with-keycloak: Delete user from vantage6 and Keycloak

user-edit.own-user-no-roles: Roles and rules not shown: you cannot change your own permissions.

kill-tasks-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to kill all tasks currently running on node '{{name}}'?
kill-tasks-dialog.content: This may disturb analyses run by other users. This operation cannot be undone.
kill-tasks-dialog.success: The node '{{name}}' has been instructed to kill all tasks.

store-user.server: Server at which user is registered

delete-dialog.title: Are you sure you want remove user '{{name}}' from algorithm store '{{store_name}}'?
delete-dialog.content: They will no longer have their current access to manage algorithm store resources.

lost.title: Lost your password?
lost.instruction: Fill in your email address in order to reset your password.

recover.title: Enter your reset token and new password
recover.message: Enter the reset token you received at your registered email address and choose a new password.

setup.title: Setup two-factor authentication
setup.message: Your system administrator requires you to set up two-factor authentication. Scan the QR code below with your favorite authenticator app to set this up.
setup.recommend: You may use your favorite authentication app. We recommend using Lastpass or Google authenticator.

manual.title: Setup two-factor authentication manually
manual.message: If you are having difficulties scanning the QR code, please enter the following code manually in your authentication app:

lost.title: Lost your code?
lost.instruction: In order to reset your two-factor authentication code, you need to get a reset token. You will receive this at your registered email address.

recover.title: Enter your reset token
recover.message: Enter the reset token you received at your registered email address.

success-dialog.title: Password changed
success-dialog.message: Your password has been changed successfully.

validation.unequal: New password cannot be the same as the old password
validation.roles-unavailable: Select an organization to determine available roles
validation.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.pattern: Password must contain a lowercase letter, uppercase letter, number and special character

communitystore.introduction: The community store is a place where you can find algorithms that are shared by members of the vantage6 community. More information about vantage6 can be found on
communitystore.contribute: If you would like to contribute to the community store, you should first check if it fits the requirements of
communitystore.contribute-email: If you do, you can send an email to
communitystore.account-and-review: to aquire and account and upload your algorithm. The algorithm will be reviewed before it is added to the community store.

confirm-dialog.title: Are you sure you want to edit this collaboration?
confirm-dialog.changing-encryption: You are changing the encryption status of this collaboration. Adding encryption will require all organizations to provide their nodes with an encryption key. Data on existing tasks will not change its encryption status and will also no longer be automatically readable by vantage6 as the assumption on encryption of their results will be wrong.
confirm-dialog.removing-organizations: You are removing organizations from this collaboration. This will also delete dataframes on the nodes of the removed organizations. This data cannot be recovered.
